summary: A utility script that converts Stable Diffusion 3 model checkpoints into the Hugging Face Diffusers format, handling the transformer, VAE, attention layers, positional embeddings, and related weight transformations before saving the model in a portable safetensors package.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to migrate existing SD3 checkpoints to the Diffusers ecosystem for streamlined deployment, fineâ€‘tuning, and integration with Hugging Face services.
